name: Netters - HTTP SERVER COMPONENT .NET
short_description:
Netters is a project designed to help users make their own http servers with visual studio, VB.NET, C# and Visual c ++

Its very easy to use and uses commands like

Server1.Listen(80) - That listens on port 80 (Default http port)

Server1.SendHtml("<html></html>") - Sends html to the server

Server1.closeAndDisplay() - Closes , disposes the connection and shows the client the data sent

Their are many more easy to use commands to make it as easy as possible to create your own http server.

Each and every request are stored in arrays for you! for example

http://127.0.0.1/index.html?search=Hello World

To retrieve that on the server side you do

Server1.SERVER_GET("search")


Netters was made as a personal home project and is now released as free ware, You may not sell Netters
